post_detail.title: Jon's Song Music Video
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

I wrote, produced, performed the song and music video.

Execution:

This video is part of a larger project - the creation and production of a full-length album of original music. We filmed the band shots in my Hoboken apartment to a music track played at half speed so that when the footage was sped up twice as fast in post production to match the music, it gave the scenes added energy and vibrance.
